member.name: T:AbstractInformation.Runtime
member.summary: Class for dynamically coded runtimes.

member.name: F:AbstractInformation.Runtime.isRunning
member.summary: The status of the runtime which the Main() loop uses to determine whether to call the RuntimeMain method.

member.name: M:AbstractInformation.Runtime.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: The constructor for the abstract runtime framework.
member.param: Contains whether the class is set to repeat its calls during the Main() loop.
The name of the plugin. Should always be set to contain confusion.

member.name: M:AbstractInformation.Runtime.Run(AbstractRuntimes.Collector)
member.summary: The abstract and virtual framework method to define what the class should function as during the main loop.
member.param: A framework dedicated singleton that acts as a pseudo namespace.
member.returns: A true if successful. False if not.

member.name: M:AbstractInformation.Runtime.OnExit
member.summary: Virtual method for what this class should do upon exiting.

member.name: M:AbstractInformation.Runtime.OnExit(AbstractRuntimes.Collector)
member.summary: Virtual method for what this class should do upon exiting that uses a collector.
member.param: A framework dedicated singleton that acts as a pseudo namespace.

member.name: M:AbstractInformation.Runtime.FollowEdits(AbstractRuntimes.Collector)
member.summary: Allows the plugin to always exit after use. Useful for plugins that only act if editing is occurring (Responder vs Updater). It also allows the privatization of the isRunning member.
member.param: The psuedo namespace for collective data.
member.returns: A true or false depending on the exit functions override status and implementation.

member.name: M:AbstractInformation.Runtime.GetStatus
member.summary: Enumerates the status into status codes.

member.name: M:AbstractInformation.Runtime.RuntimeMain(AbstractRuntimes.Collector)
member.summary: This method should be untouched, as it is the hardcoded function run by the Main() loop. Any changes should be made to the virtual run method.
member.param: A framework dedicated singleton that acts as a pseudo namespace.
member.returns: A true if successful, or a false if failure occurs. If an exception is thrown it is printed and caught.

member.name: T:AbstractRuntimes.Collector
member.summary: Singleton class for passing readable strings to the Main() loop.

member.name: M:AbstractRuntimes.Collector.#ctor
member.summary: Empty singleton constructor.

member.name: P:AbstractRuntimes.Collector.Instance
member.summary: Gets the instance and locks and unlocks the instantiation for thread safety.

member.name: P:AbstractRuntimes.Collector.PublicInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the string allowed for viewing.

member.name: P:AbstractRuntimes.Collector.IsEditing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an app has flagged all apps to wait on closing.

member.name: T:AbstractRuntimes.Program
member.summary: The entry point to the application.

member.name: M:AbstractRuntimes.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Substantial loop of the application.
member.param: Default args unused.

member.name: T:Encryption.ROT13Cipher
member.summary: ROT13 encryptor.

member.name: M:Encryption.ROT13Cipher.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initialization settings for the ROT13 cipher.
member.param: Should the runtime be started with the application.
What is the name of the runtime.

member.name: M:Encryption.ROT13Cipher.Run(AbstractRuntimes.Collector)
member.summary: The definition of how the cipher should act during the Main() loop.
member.param: A framework dedicated singleton that acts as a pseudo namespace.

member.name: M:Encryption.ROT13Cipher.OnExit(AbstractRuntimes.Collector)
member.summary: Overrides the exit function to check if the collector is being edited.
member.param: The singleton storing state.
member.returns: A value indicating the result of the exit.

member.name: T:StringManipulation.PigLatinConverter
member.summary: A converter which implements a continuous runtime abstract base class that will display user inputs in pig latin.

member.name: F:StringManipulation.PigLatinConverter.stringBuilder
member.summary: A generic string manipulation class.

member.name: M:StringManipulation.PigLatinConverter.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Class constructor.
member.param: Whether the converter should start with the application or not.
The name for the runtime (converter) for logging.

member.name: M:StringManipulation.PigLatinConverter.Run(AbstractRuntimes.Collector)
member.summary: Defines how the application should act during its focus in Main().
member.param: A framework dedicated singleton that acts as a pseudo namespace.
member.returns: A true if successful. False if not. Or an Exception if thrown.

member.name: T:Utility.Input
member.summary: An input utility class for reading and displaying lines.

member.summary: Displays a string to the console.

member.name: M:Utility.Input.OutBlankLine
member.summary: Displays a new line to the console.

member.name: M:Utility.Input.In
member.summary: Reads a string from the console.
member.returns: The string which has been read from the user.

member.name: M:Utility.Input.PromptRepeat
member.summary: A default display for input from the user.
member.returns: A bool on success with a valid character.

member.name: M:Utility.Input.ValidateStringLength(System.String)
member.summary: Validates string is active by checking its length.
member.param: The string to check.
member.returns: A true if the string has content, or a false if it does not.

member.name: M:Utility.Input.EnforceYesOrNoInput(System.String)
member.summary: Enforces that an input has been given a correct yes or no character.
member.param: The string to validate.
member.returns: The same string if it is valid, or repeats until the user enters a valid string and returns it.

member.name: M:Utility.Input.PassOrFailString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: A wrapper method for failing input via exception.

member.returns: A true if it passes, or throws an exception if it fails.
member.exception: Generic exception type with a basic failure message to display.

member.summary: Checks if a string contains any of the leetters in the concurrent string.
member.param: The string to compare.
The letters to check for at the beginning.
member.returns: True if the comparable string starts with one of the letters.

member.name: M:Utility.Input.RemoveAtAny(System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the substring leading up to either of the trigger values.
member.param: The string to alter.
The characters to trigger the cut.

member.name: M:Utility.Input.AppendString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends a string to another string safely.

The string to be added.
